zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·乌里扬诺夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯共产主义革命家、政治家、思想家，苏维埃俄国和苏联的主要缔造者。
description.en: Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, the main founder of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·列宁的父亲。
description.en: Father of Vladimir Lenin.

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·亚历山德罗芙娜·乌里扬诺娃

description.zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·列宁的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Vladimir Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 弗拉基米尔·列宁的哥哥，因参与刺杀沙皇亚历山大三世的计划而被处决。
description.en: Vladimir Lenin's older brother, executed for his part in a plot to assassinate Tsar Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国沙皇。
description.en: Tsar of the Russian Empire.

zh-cn: 娜杰日达·克鲁普斯卡娅

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯布尔什维克革命家，弗拉基米尔·列宁的妻子。
description.en: Russian Bolshevik revolutionary and wife of Vladimir Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，在列宁去世后成为苏联领导人。
description.en: Soviet politician who became the leader of the Soviet Union after Lenin's death.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义革命家和理论家，苏联红军的创始人和领导人。
description.en: Marxist revolutionary and theorist, founder and leader of the Red Army.

zh-cn: 尤里·奥西波维奇·马尔托夫

description.zh-cn: 孟什维克派系的领导人。
description.en: Leader of the Menshevik faction.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯革命家和马克思主义理论家，被称为“俄国马克思主义之父”。
description.en: Russian revolutionary and Marxist theoretician, known as the 'father of Russian Marxism'.

description.zh-cn: 哲学家、经济学家、历史学家、政治理论家，马克思主义的创始人。
description.en: Philosopher, economist, historian, and political theorist, founder of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 社会革命党成员，因试图刺杀列宁而被处决。
description.en: Member of the Socialist Revolutionary Party, executed for attempting to assassinate Lenin.

zh-cn: 费利克斯·埃德蒙多维奇·捷尔任斯基

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克革命家，全俄肃清反革命及怠工非常委员会（契卡）的创始人。
description.en: Bolshevik revolutionary and founder of the All-Russian Extraordinary Commission (Cheka).

description.zh-cn: 老布尔什维克革命家，共产国际的第一任主席。
description.en: Old Bolshevik revolutionary and the first head of the Communist International.

description.zh-cn: 老布尔什维克革命家，苏联早期领导人之一。
description.en: Old Bolshevik revolutionary and an early leader of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 法国共产主义者，与列宁关系密切，一些传记作者称其为列宁的情人。
description.en: French communist closely associated with Lenin; some biographers suggest she was his lover.

description.zh-cn: 由弗拉基米尔·列宁领导的俄国社会民主工党的一个派别，后来成为苏联共产党。
description.en: A faction of the Russian Social Democratic Labour Party led by Vladimir Lenin, which later became the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 由列宁和布尔什维克党建立的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state founded by Lenin and the Bolshevik Party.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯的革命社会主义政党，后分裂为布尔什维克和孟什维克。
description.en: A revolutionary socialist political party in Russia that later split into Bolshevik and Menshevik factions.

description.zh-cn: 由尤里·马尔托夫领导的俄国社会民主工党的一个派别。
description.en: A faction of the Russian Social Democratic Labour Party led by Yuli Martov.

description.zh-cn: 由列宁领导的布尔什维克发动的革命，推翻了俄国临时政府。
description.en: A revolution led by Lenin's Bolsheviks that overthrew the Russian Provisional Government.

description.zh-cn: 二月革命后成立的临时政府，后被十月革命推翻。
description.en: The provisional government established after the February Revolution, which was overthrown by the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 推翻沙皇尼古拉二世统治并导致俄国临时政府成立的革命。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew Tsar Nicholas II and resulted in the formation of the Russian Provisional Government.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命后成立的苏维埃俄国和苏联的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest executive authority of Soviet Russia and the Soviet Union after the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 列宁在1921年推行的经济政策，允许部分私有企业存在。
description.en: An economic policy introduced by Lenin in 1921 which allowed for some private enterprise.

description.zh-cn: 由布尔什维克政府发起的政治镇压和大规模处决运动。
description.en: A campaign of political repression and mass killings carried out by the Bolshevik government.

zh-cn: 全俄肃清反革命及怠工非常委员会

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃俄国的第一个国家安全组织，是红色恐怖的主要执行机构。
description.en: The first Soviet state security organization and the main instrument of the Red Terror.

description.zh-cn: 由列宁创立的国际共产主义组织，旨在推动世界革命。
description.en: An international communist organization founded by Lenin that advocated for world revolution.

description.zh-cn: 布尔什维克红军与反布尔什维克的白军之间的多方战争。
description.en: A multi-party war between the Bolshevik Red Army and the anti-Bolshevik White Army.

zh-cn: 布列斯特-立陶夫斯克条约

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃俄国与同盟国签署的和平条约，使俄国退出第一次世界大战。
description.en: A peace treaty signed between Soviet Russia and the Central Powers that ended Russia's participation in World War I.

description.zh-cn: 列宁口授的一系列文件，其中评估了布尔什维克领导人并建议将斯大林从总书记职位上调开。
description.en: A series of documents dictated by Lenin which assessed Bolshevik leaders and recommended Stalin's removal as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 两人成为极亲密的好友，一些传记作者表示两人存在婚外情。
description.en: Became very close friends, with some biographers stating they had an extramarital affair.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫加入了计划暗杀沙皇亚历山大三世的革命组织。
description.en: Aleksandr Ulyanov joined a revolutionary group that planned to assassinate Tsar Alexander III.

description.zh-cn: 亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫因参与刺杀沙皇的阴谋而被绞刑处死。
description.en: Aleksandr Ulyanov was executed by hanging for his role in the assassination plot against the Tsar.

description.zh-cn: 其兄长亚历山大·乌里扬诺夫于1887年遭到沙皇处决后，列宁决定接受革命社会主义的政治立场。
description.en: After his brother Aleksandr Ulyanov was executed by the Tsarist regime in 1887, Lenin decided to adopt a revolutionary socialist political stance.

description.zh-cn: 列宁的思想体系根基于马克思主义。
description.en: Lenin's ideological system is rooted in Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 列宁阅读了普列汉诺夫的著作，并认同其主张，即俄罗斯必须凭借无产阶级才能实现社会主义。
description.en: Lenin read the works of Plekhanov and agreed with his argument that Russia must rely on the proletariat to achieve socialism.

description.zh-cn: 因参与抗议活动而被开除。
description.en: Was expelled for participating in protests.

description.zh-cn: 以旁听生身份参加考试并毕业。
description.en: Graduated as an external student.

position.zh-cn: 高级干部，布尔什维克派系领导人
position.en: Senior member, leader of the Bolshevik faction

description.zh-cn: 在1903年俄国社会民主工党第二次代表大会上，列宁领导的派系成为布尔什维克。
description.en: At the Second Congress of the RSDLP in 1903, Lenin's faction emerged as the Bolsheviks.

description.zh-cn: 在俄国社会民主工党第二次代表大会上，党分裂为布尔什维克和孟什维克两个敌对派系。
description.en: The party split into two rival factions, the Bolsheviks and Mensheviks, at the Second Congress of the RSDLP.

description.zh-cn: 二月革命推翻了沙皇并建立了俄国临时政府。
description.en: The February Revolution overthrew the Tsar and established the Russian Provisional Government.

description.zh-cn: 列宁返回俄罗斯后，领导发动了十月革命。
description.en: After returning to Russia, Lenin led the October Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命使布尔什维克推翻了临时政府。
description.en: The October Revolution saw the Bolsheviks overthrow the Provisional Government.

position.en: Chairman of the Council of People's Commissars

description.zh-cn: 列宁强烈要求布尔什维克接受德国的提案，以确保政府的生存。
description.en: Lenin strongly urged the Bolsheviks to accept Germany's proposals to ensure the survival of the government.

description.zh-cn: 社会革命党成员范妮·卡普兰试图刺杀列宁，致其重伤。
description.en: Socialist Revolutionary Party member Fanny Kaplan attempted to assassinate Lenin, severely wounding him.

description.zh-cn: 列宁下令建立全俄肃清反革命及怠工非常委员会（契卡），作为政治警察机构。
description.en: Lenin ordered the establishment of the All-Russian Extraordinary Commission (Cheka) as a political police force.

description.zh-cn: 契卡是红色恐怖的主要执行机构。
description.en: The Cheka was the main instrument for carrying out the Red Terror.

description.zh-cn: 列宁规划并召开了共产国际第一次代表大会，以推动世界革命。
description.en: Lenin planned and convened the First Congress of the Communist International to promote world revolution.

description.zh-cn: 列宁向中央政治局提出新经济政策，以恢复内战后凋敝的经济。
description.en: Lenin proposed the New Economic Policy to the Politburo to revive the economy after the Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 列宁是苏联的主要缔造者，并在其成立后成为首位政府主席。
description.en: Lenin was the main founder of the Soviet Union and became its first head of government upon its creation.

description.zh-cn: 列宁在遗嘱中建议将斯大林从总书记职位上调开。
description.en: In his testament, Lenin recommended that Stalin be removed from the post of General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 在俄国内战中，红军与白军是主要的敌对双方。
description.en: During the Russian Civil War, the Red Army and the White Army were the main opposing forces.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基被任命组建和领导工农红军。
description.en: Trotsky was appointed to organize and lead the Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 捷尔任斯基是契卡的第一任领导人。
description.en: Dzerzhinsky was the first leader of the Cheka.
